description: This Enjoy Gadgets Mini Display Port (Thunderbolt Port Compatible) to VGA adapter sends video from your MacBook, Mac, or PC to a monitor, TV, or projector. Since virtually any monitor, TV, or projector has a VGA port but not necessarily a DVI or HDMI port, this adapter will make sure you can:1. Extend or mirror your workstation to another screen;2. Give presentation to your classmates, students or colleagues with your own MacBook or laptop;3. Share videos with your friends and family on a bigger external screen or TV. How to Use It1. Connect one end to your computer's Thunderbolt port;2. Connect its female VGA port to a VGA cable that goes to your TV/monitor/projector. Compatibility The following computers are supported:1. Apple MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro 13 inch, MacBook Pro 15 inch, MacBook Pro 17 inch;2. Apple Mac, Mac Pro, Mac Mini, iMac, Xserve;3. All other computers with Thunderbolt port, Mini Display Port. Only versions released after year 2011 have Thunderbolt ports. Please make sure the video port on your Apple computer is a Thunderbolt port. Specifications Connectors: Mini Display Port (male) VGA (female);Compliance: Mini Display Port v1.1a compliant; mDP does not support Thunderbolt products such as hard-drives; Resolutions: 1920 x 1200, 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 576p, 576i, 480p, 480i;
title: EnjoyGadgets TBVGAA Thunderbolt to VGA Video Adapter Cable
